item.description:
Come join me for a Sunday afternoon of skating. We will meet inside at 1:45 to put on our skates so that we can enjoy the whole hour and 50 minutes of skating time. There is a snack bar there if you get the munchies or want some hot chocolate to warm up.

You may want to dress in layers, since you may tend to get warm after skating for a while. Gloves, hats or ear muffs are recommended.

This meetup may be cancelled in the event of a snow storm or there is not at least a minimum of 4 YES RSVP's including organizer.

They DO have rentals available. More details to follow soon on admission and rental cost.

Sunday Public Skating Hours 2:00pm-3:50pm

Hope to see you there!

Alison

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Ice Skating Anyone (Revisited)
